title: Dobermann.1997[Swe+Eng subs]DVDrip.Royskatt
description:
Genre: Action
Audio: Franska/French
Subs: Swedish/English (optional subtitels as .srt-files)
IMDB: 6,4
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0118996/

The subs are optional, so there are no problem to watch the movie without them, if you prefer only to use the french audio.

Plot Engslish:
The charismatic criminal Dobermann, who got his first gun when he was christened, leads a gang of brutal robbers. After a complex and brutal bank robbery, they are being hunted by the Paris police. The hunt is led by the sadistic cop Christini, who only has one goal: to catch Dobermann at any cost.

Upploader would be happy for a thanks when you start download the movie. If you dont care about thanking, its not necessary to comment if you have some problem :)
If you dont want to seed (share) with other - buy the DVD at cdon.com instead. Sharing is caring!

Dont know how to mount subs in your mediaplayer? Unrar the .rar-file with i.e winrar and "extract here" to keep the extracted .srt-files in the same folder as the movie.
Then you can either do as following:
a. Load the prefered language through the menue on your mediaplayer.
b. Rename the .avi and prefered .srt-file to match (do not change filetype by changing .avi and .srt!!) Most mediaplayer will then detect the subs automaticly.
c. Some mediaplayers also allows you to "drag and drop" the prefered .srt-file onto the screen when playing the movie, and then start the subtitles.
Still problems? I would recomend VLC Mediaplayer - that is my favourite :) or try to google for answer. TBP also has a nice forum - maybe you can get some information there.
